name: Fahad HSBC Integration for WooCommerce
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
After activation you will see another payment gateway under WooCommerce settings > payments tab.

  • Author: Fahad Mahmood

  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/plugins/hsbc

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s it. Check the WooCommerce settings > payments tab.

short_description: An easy to use payment gateway HSBC for WooCommerce users.
